info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Yuma County through 500 PM MDT... At 430 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Eckley, or 12 miles northwest of Wray, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wray around 445 PM MDT. This includes Highway 385 between mile markers 243 and 259. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for northeastern Colorado.
